jobs.title: UX Engineer, Front End
jobs.role_description: Design user experience front end for various products
jobs.requirements: BA in CS or equivalent practical experience, experience with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, experience designing and implementing UIs, experience in development or prototyping

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.role_description: Work on one of various software teams
jobs.requirements: BA in CS or equivalent practical experience, 2+ years of professional or project experience in software using object-oriented languages such as C++, C#, Java, Python, or PHP, ability to coordinate effectively in a multi-team environment, detail oriented, highly organized, self-directed, great communication skills, great time-management skills, adequate problem resolution and decision-making skills

jobs.title: AI/ML - Applied Research Scientist
jobs.role_description: Create innovative experiences with machine learning and sensing
jobs.requirements: Experience applying signal processing and machine learning techniques to time-series sensor data, strong software development skills with proficiency in Python, creative, collaborative, and product focused, PhD in Machine Learning CS, or related field with 3+ years of industry experience OR MS in related field with 3-5 years of industry experience

jobs.title: Operations Engineer
jobs.role_description: Design and improve software and processes associated with Amazon fulfillment
jobs.requirements: BA in industrial or mechanical engineering or a related STEM field, experience with Microsoft Office products, experience with CAD software
